scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build
scripts.local: npm run build && sam local invoke -e ./event.json Function --env-vars ./local_env_vars.json
scripts.package: npm run build && sam package --template-file template.yml --output-template-file packaged-template.yml --s3-bucket lambda-warming-testing --profile sandbox
scripts.deploy: npm run package && sam deploy --template-file packaged-template.yml --stack-name Lambda-Warmer --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --profile sandbox
